column2: "When discussing a Fighter's signature weapons, one must not neglect the Twin Daggers."
"Their overwhelming speed allows you to unleash a flurry of attacks, leaving your opponent no time to react."
"Well, the best way to learn is to dive in head-first and try it for yourself."
"I've prepared some basic Twin Daggers for you. Give them a go."
"Twin Daggers are striking weapons that seamlessly merge offence and defence."

"Although their attack range is short, they have excellent handling. They can easily chase enemies in the air and perform stunning aerial attacks.

<%WeaponActionText>: Perform a Spin."
